original_title: La extraña: Notas sobre el (auto) exilio
overview: Based on the writings of Atahualpa Yupanqui and Marcelo Viñar, this dreamlike documentary addresses what it means to belong to a place. Through philosophical motifs and abstract compositions, La Extraña confronts the potential dissociation with one’s own sense of being. A Doc Fortnight/Cinema Tropical collaboration.
title: The Stranger: Notes on [Self] Exile
